ai-patthana18.29:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.29:0.3_0: It’s is to see someone else, to make it pretty, and ugly.
ai-patthana18.29:1.1_0: Not seeing have gone for refuge to the teaching, the Dhamma should be given up for refuge.
ai-patthana18.29:1.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana18.29:2.1_0: Not reciting what is a cause, not to be given up.
ai-patthana18.29:3.1_0: If you haven’t reached the supreme end of the spiritual path, the causes and conditions that give rise to sorrow.
ai-patthana18.29:4.1_0: There is no conditioned phenomena that give rise to sorrow. Nor do they arise when they are.
ai-patthana18.29:5.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana18.29:6.1_0: The eighteen things that prone to being hard to admonish.
ai-patthana18.29:7.1_0: The prohibition against the training rules is finished.
